website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a shoe that is comfortable, stylish, and versatile, the Adidas Kaptir is for you. It is a sport-inspired sneaker that is a little bit different in the eyes. It can accommodate diverse fashion styles, making it not only a perfect shoe for casual outings but also light workouts and date nights.
pros: A large percentage of reviewers love the comfort the Adidas Kaptir offers
This Adidas sneaker is very stylish and versatile, which allows it to cater to a wide variety of outfits, according to many buyers
Most of the wearers of the shoe receive plenty of compliments while wearing it due to its beautiful design
A lot of end users praise the Kaptir sneakers for having a great set of colorways
Many find the soft sole of this sneaker commendable
Plenty of users find the lightness of the shoe to be a good asset
Nearly all of the reviewers highly recommend the Kaptir shoes from Adidas for being a high-quality sneaker
cons: Several express their dislike for the Adidas Kaptir’s lacing system because, aside from not looking good on the shoe, the users cannot tighten the laces
Few find the label on the tab at the back of the shoe unattractive

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, at a discount price!
customer_reviews.text: My son bought these for the second time. First time, he bought them in a store and paid $80. He grew out of those and found these on Amazon for only $43!! He was very excited. These are great shoes and hold up well. We see them in a store today for $80! Very thrilled we got such a good deal and they’re worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: K.Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very nice style and great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband after I got this style for women at Dick's sporting goods. He loves them, comfortable and look nice too, wish Amazon had more of these for women with the same good prices that the men styles have.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica5M

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight running shoes 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Adidas to begin with. These are some of the most comfortable shoes. Very lightweight. The ankles are really tight. It’s a narrow fit. I prefer that for running. Be warned they are more narrow than most running shoes. For the price, I’m giving this 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sexy legs making new shoes look good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and make my legs look nice, so how can I complain. I actually bought a second pair for when these get dirty. The other great thing is that they are not Nike’s.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I can run faster and jump higher
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneaker - fits well - provides good support - is very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: J. Aceti

customer_reviews.title: Hard to wear
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable . But those who have little heavy feet they can wear without effort
customer_reviews.author: maria cheema

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe !
customer_reviews.text: For the price , they are okay ! They fit good ! They look good ! Not a bad shoe !
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a great replacement for the adidas cloud foam 2 running shoes that they previously sold. They are stylish, affordable, and should last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: pacris

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: It fits very well and feels amazing.The shoe looks just like the pictures on this site.
customer_reviews.author: Emelie Myers

customer_reviews.title: True to size, fits well and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazingly comfortable, They fit true to the size, and easy to put on. Also my last pair I had just like this lasted a year. So they are well made shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: adidas Men's KAPTIR Sneaker, None None None, 6 UK
feature_bullets: Core few men sport inspired Adidas
The Adidas brand has a long history and deep-rooted Connection with sport. Everything we do is rooted in sport

Driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation as well as decades of accumulating sports science expertise, we cater for all, from elite professional athletes and teams to any individual who wants to able sport part of their lives
